name: The Winds of September
description:
Take a ride in your cosy caravan as it travels through a scenic forest setting. Be sure to keep your plants watered, pass the time with a few good books, and maybe make yourself a little food to nibble on as you lay beneath the skylight at the back.

WASD/Left Stick to move
Mouse/Right Stick to look around
Escape to quit

I made this for my birthday, and got some contributions from my girlfriend Emi, and my friends Notewell and Jayde. I didn't get the chance to add everything yet so I'll be updating over the next week or so as I do that! In the meantime, relax for me.
